graph_title: Average acidity (pH) of Lake Sevan measured at agreed suite of representative sampling stations
indicator_name: Average acidity (pH) of Lake Sevan measured at agreed suite of representative sampling stations
national_indicator_description: 14.3.1global indicator is mainly based on observations that contain/limit the carbon system required to determine the variability of water acidity in a water management zone. The carbon system in this context refers to 4 main measurable indicators. pH (sliding scale hydrogen ion concentration), CT (total dissolved inorganic carbon), pCO2 (partial pressure of carbon dioxide) and AT (total alkalinity). Only pH is presented as a national indicator.
computation_calculations: The value of the indicator is obtained by means of a corresponding measuring device.
